HM-HOTTA_nitai_look_ALL-01.Content: A link to the Hykros Weapons Database has been established.

HM-HOTTA_nitai_look_ALL-02.Content: Permission to release Hykros Simulacrum System data has been granted.

HM-HOTTA_nitai_look_ALL-03.Content: A link to the Hykros Simulacrum Database has been established.

HM-HOTTA_nitai_look_ALL-05.Content: Permission to release Hykros Weapons System data has been granted.

HM-SME01_ALL_01-02.Content: When there's cheese, the mouse will walk into the trap.

HM-SME01_ALL_01-03.Content: And... I see you're trapped. Bwa-ha-ha-ha!

HM-SME01_ALL_01-04.Content: Now it's time to hand out gifts to our guests! Surprise!

HM-SME01_ALL_01-06.Content: Don't worry. If you can remove the timer, you can get out of this alive.

HM-SME01_ALL_01-07.Content: But if you fail... Well, at least you'll die together.

HM-SME01_ALL_01-08.Content: It looks like your lives are in each other's hands.

HM-SME01_ALL_01-09.Content: Very clich√©, but I love it nonetheless.

HM-SME01_ALL_02-03.Content: I gotta see the looks on your faces now!

HM-SME01_ALL_02-04.Content: Too bad I couldn't see them for myself.

HM-SME01_ALL_02-07.Content: Next time... You won't be so lucky.

HM-XSYD-3.Content: Ha, this will be a perfect pawn.

HM-HOTTA_SME_02_All-03.Content: I warned you, didn't I? It's the real deal this time.

HM-HOTTA_SME_02_All-04.Content: Don't say I didn't give you a chance. The control panel of the emergency exit is inside.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-02.Content: What have you done to her?

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-03.Content: I would also like to know what they did to her.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-04.Content: The hero defeated the demon, but the princess is never waking up.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-08.Content: Just as pathetic as I once was.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-10.Content: Good question. Who do you think I am?

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-12.Content: Samir... Were you playing me for a fool the whole time?

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-13.Content: Of course I was. The real Huma is asleep in that tank over there.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-14.Content: How does it feel? Lost? Scared?

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-15.Content: Or... you realized that you've been had, and you only feel anger and confusion?

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-16.Content: What is it that you want?

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-17.Content: What do you think I want? You don't understand how I feel.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-18.Content: I looked for her for years. I saw her face, and I thought I had an answer...

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-20.Content: They wear my friend's face as if it was rightfully theirs to start with.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-22.Content: This is what you're looking for. The original data of T-04.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-23.Content: The person that I grew up with lives inside this tiny chip.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-24.Content: I don't want to see those things. It disgusts me, knowing that it's someone else inside.

HM-HOTTA_SME_03_ALL-26.Content: I will not hand her over to Hykros again. Tell Dr. Joaquin that I will gladly shoulder the consequences.

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-01.Content: Not too shabby, am I right?

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-02.Content: Did both you and Zeke grow up here?

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-03.Content: We... have been living here since we were very little.

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-04.Content: There weren't a lot of people back then. Everyone chipped in to build this place little by little.

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-06.Content: Ms. Celine is read-d-d-y. You may proceed over at any time.

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-09.Content: Greetings, I am Mi-a. A fo... fo... fourth‚ÄîbzZZzt‚Äîgeneration smart servant.

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-10.Content: Mi-a's my assistant. Zeke found her in one of the ruins!

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-11.Content: But its language module is a little buggy, so it talks funny sometimes.

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-12.Content: I apologize. I will do my best to make my speech intelligible.

HM-HOTTA_CICIAppear_ALL-14.Content: C-Come with me, please. We should not keep Ms. Celine waiting.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-02.Content: Do I look like I'm panicking? Or...

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-03.Content: Do you think I shouldn't be so calm?

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-05.Content: I don't want to argue. I just hope you can take our suggestions seriously. We need your trust.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-06.Content: I once believed you without reservations, but... what did I get?

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-08.Content: Archon Elric, I've been thinking a lot, and I've come to a conclusion.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-09.Content: I was wrong to have hopes in you in the first place.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-10.Content: Oh, it's you. Out of all the guests today, you're the first one that I don't dislike.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-11.Content: Um, I was just wondering if you reached a consensus during your conversation...

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-14.Content: I can help. Not because of you, but because of that girl named Shirli.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-16.Content: No need to thank me. I just don't want to see someone else going through the same unpleasant things that I did.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-17.Content: Since we're here, Franz, please tell us what we know.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-18.Content: Let's start with the spacetime turbulence that devoured Zeke.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-19.Content: We monitored and analyzed the relevant characteristics, and we're certain that Zeke was sent into a secondary dimension.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-20.Content: We compared the known dimensional information graph, and the secondary dimension that most closely matches this turbulent plane is called "Vera."

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-21.Content: Hykros managed to locate Vera and its coordinates about three years ago.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-22.Content: They also sent a squad led by an Executor named Mooke to investigate.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-23.Content: Two years ago, Vera shifted and its coordinates changed. As a result, we lost all contact with the plane.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-24.Content: However, with the turbulence produced by this accident, we may be able to locate Vera again.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-25.Content: That's where my brother is, right?

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-26.Content: I cannot guarantee, but it's very likely.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-27.Content: If we can locate Vera again and re-establish contact with Mooke's squad...

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-28.Content: Then... we might be able to find Zeke?

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-29.Content: That's where Cl... Dr. Claire comes in.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-30.Content: Her knowledge in this matter is unparalleled.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-31.Content: Don't get your hopes up. All I can say is that I'll do my best.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-32.Content: I don't want you to have unrealistic expectations and then be disappointed.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-34.Content: To celebrate the fact that we are finally friends again, I suggest that...

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-35.Content: It's getting late. If there's no other business, please leave me alone. I will let you know if I have any new information.

HM-HOTTA_OverSet02_ALL-36.Content: Um... Alright. See you later, then?

HM-ALL-4.Content: Access level verified. You are allowed to proceed to Hykros - Parliament.

HM-chudong-2.Content: Just a little more... A little...

HM-chudong-5.Content: Take 'em away, and wipe their memory.

HM-XSYD_lang-1.Content: A mine... This wasn't mentioned in the intel.

HM-XSYD_lang-2.Content: Energy reserves are low. Please don't fail me now...

HM-HOTTA_FB_XSYD-01.Content: You wished to see me, my lord?

HM-HOTTA_FB_XSYD-02.Content: Hykros has sent someone into the quarantine zone.

HM-HOTTA_FB_XSYD-03.Content: It's time to release the hounds.

HM-HOTTA_FB_XSYD-04.Content: Target signal lost. I can't locate it anymore.

HM-HOTTA_FB_XSYD-05.Content: Careful. Something about this place doesn't feel right.

HM-HOTTA_xinglai-1.Content: Zeke, their heart rate is stable.

HM-HOTTA_xinglai-2.Content: The worst is over. Now comes the road to recovery.

HM-HOTTA_xinglai-3.Content: Good thing we got there in time...

HM-hotta_kill_shali-1.Content: You have to do it, Zeke.

HM-hotta_kill_shali-7.Content: Shirli's not a monster! I'll make her better!

HM-hotta_kill_shali-13.Content: What happened? What have I done?

HM-hotta_kill_shali-14.Content: Did I... did I hurt someone?

HM-hotta_kill_shali-16.Content: I don't want this. Zeke, you know what you have to do.

HM-hotta_kill_shali-19.Content: Shirli... I can't. I just can't...

HM-tuidaoGG-2.Content: Didn't see this big guy coming!

HM-hotta_kill_shali-20.Content: I don't have much time left...

HM-hotta_kill_shali-21.Content: Don't let me become one of those things, brother.

HM-hotta_kill_shali-24.Content: I'm sorry. I'll be steering clear of trouble from now on...

HM-hotta_kill_shali-25.Content: Thank you... for staying by my side all this time.

HM-hotta_kill_shali-27.Content: Oh? What did you wish for?

HM-hotta_kill_shali-30.Content: You told me that when I grow up, you'll show me the world outside!

HM-hotta_kill_shali-33.Content: Farewell, brother. I... I'm missing Mom and Dad.

HM-hotta_kill_shali-34.Content: Farewell, brother. I... I'm missing Mom and Dad.

HM-hotta_kill_shali-35.Content: Where are we going this time, brother?

HM-hotta_kill_shali-36.Content: I'm sorry, this will be the last time I act willfully.

HM-hotta_kill_shali-37.Content: Farewell, brother... I miss Mom and Dad now.

HM-hotta_kill_shali-38.Content: I don't have much time left, Zeke.

HM-hotta_kill_shali-39.Content: Don't let me become one of those things, please.

HM-portal-all-3.Content: Get ready! They're a piece of work!

HM-givekey-2.Content: This is the latest development from Hykros's research. I hope you'll make good use of its power.

HM-givekey-3.Content: Looks like you two are getting along fine.

HM-HOTTA_ZC_baozha-10.Content: Huh? What am I supposed to do with this little thing!?

HM-HOTTA_ZC_baozha-13.Content: We can go back to before the explosion!

HM-HOTTA_ZC_baozha-14.Content: Hurry! Grab it before it's too late!

HM-xiayu-3.Content: I shouldn't have acted recklessly and made him mad.

HM-xiayu-5.Content: Let's apologize to him after the rain stops.

HM-dg-3.Content: We did it! We did it!

HM-dg-5.Content: So, this is what it really looks like...

HM-dg-9.Content: I told you it's dangerous out here!

HM-dg-11.Content: Help? You're only giving me more trouble!

HM-dg-13.Content: There is no "but"! Go back immediately! Without my permission, you can't...

HM-qidao_01.Content: May those who are suffering earn a respite.

HM-qidao_02.Content: May you forget your pain and rest in peace.

HM-HOTTA_FB_zhuabu-3.Content: This table is getting old. Look, the paint is chipped here and there.

HM-HOTTA_FB_zhuabu-4.Content: You, you, and you, keep an eye on the basement.

HM-HOTTA_Set02_2Infernal_ALL-1.Content: You can't stop me! I promised! I promised!

HM-HOTTA_Set02_4TheAngel-1.Content: Kolador had a chance to work with us to save Theo, but he refused.

HM-HOTTA_Set02_4TheAngel-5.Content: Number two! Take me to see him.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_cemetery_All-3.Content: Can't you see the reality of things? She's already...

HM-HOTTA_Set01_cemetery_All-4.Content: Don't jump to conclusions so easily, Franz. She will be given a new life.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_cemetery_All-5.Content: A new life? As what, a clone? Droid? Or... maybe something like you?

HM-HOTTA_Set01_cemetery_All-6.Content: Isn't it rather superficial to cast judgement on what life is or is not?

HM-HOTTA_Set01_cemetery_All-7.Content: This, to me, is not called... living.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_cemetery_All-8.Content: The Sage asked me to tell you something. We all have our own paths to walk. Don't cross any lines.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_cemetery_All-9.Content: Ha, I just hope none of us will regret.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_cemetery_All-10.Content: It is time. Let us go.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_cemetery_All-11.Content: Zeke, I pray you know what you're doing.

HM-HOTTA_Set03_Revive_All-4.Content: Looks like the experiment is getting delayed.

HM-BOSS_goodbye_All-3.Content: Zeke! Where... are you taking her?

HM-BOSS_goodbye_All-5.Content: But I don't want to get you tangled up in what happens later.

HM-BOSS_JIXIE_ALL-1.Content: I'm going to start the awakening. Ready?

HOTTASet04TruthALL-2.Content: The history the doctor talked about is...

HOTTASet04TruthALL-3.Content: You have the right to know indeed.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-4.Content: Many years ago, we achieved time retracement with Omnium.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-40.Content: At the time, we thought we had Omnium under our control.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-6.Content: About five decades ago, a never-before-seen disease started to spread throughout the continent.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-7.Content: Those who contracted the disease turned aberrant. They would lose their reason gradually and eventually turn into violent and wild creatures.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-10.Content: Omnium radiation is responsible for the disease. All the Omnium Towers have turned into sources of radiation.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-100.Content: An outbreak of aberration ensued and it hit Hykros, too...

HOTTASet04TruthALL-11.Content: Calling it the doomsday would not be too far off.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-12.Content: It hit us that we could rewind the time and prevent this plague from happening when things were hopeless.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-130.Content: In our first attempt, we had traveled back in time successfully, but were too late to stop the disaster.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-14.Content: In the second attempt, the accident happened right after we rewound the time.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-15.Content: Omnium has gone out of our control.

HOTTASet04TruthALL-16.Content: The radiation erupted from the Tower of Fantasy. What's more astonishing is that... half of the land on Aida was gone.

HOTTA_Set04_Yala_2.Content: You promised! You promised to bring her back to me!

HOTTA_Set04_Yala_3.Content: I will keep my promise, child. As long as you...

HOTTA_Set04_Yala_4.Content: I... I won't work for you anymore!

HOTTA_5_kaipao_4.Content: No! The Heirs of Aida are here!

HOTTA_5_kaipao_5.Content: Get back here! This interference! The EM Blasters are out of control!

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-03.Content: Hykros made a lot of... bad decisions.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-04.Content: We saw how the Cataclysm ripped through the world, and we tried to fight back.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-05.Content: But... it was all in vain.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-06.Content: The ground underneath our feet is just a fleeting moment of what this world once was.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-08.Content: We discovered Omnium, and we took advantage of it.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-09.Content: We childishly thought we could control Omnium.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-10.Content: We were naive enough to think that we'd have a better future.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-12.Content: About fifty years ago, unknown aberrations started to spread on a very large scale.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-13.Content: When we discovered that radiation from Omnium was the culprit, it was too late.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-14.Content: To save it, we took a risk and did something even more forbidden.

HM-HOTTASet04TruthALL-15.Content: We tried to affect the spacetime structure with Omnium, so that we could wipe the timeline and go back in time.

HM-HOTTA_4V4chetui_ALL-02.Content: So stubborn and so incredibly foolish.

HM-HOTTA_4V4chetui_ALL-03.Content: I want you to see the rebirth of the world with your own eyes!

HM-HOTTA_4V4_all-01.Content: Sorry, I should have prepared a more... fitting welcome.

HM-HOTTA_4V4_all-02.Content: You're insane! Stop this madness right now!

HM-HOTTA_4V4_all-03.Content: Zeke, Hank... ought to be proud of you.

HM-HOTTA_4V4_all-04.Content: Don't you dare mention my father!

HM-HOTTA_4V4_all-06.Content: What your father sacrificed himself for.

HM-HOTTA_2_shatanPK_ALL-02.Content: But you must remember your manners when you ask a question next time.

HM-timeALL-01.Content: I... Please, give me another chance. Please...

HM-HOTTA_Set05_Retreat_ALL-04.Content: Seele, it's time to go home.

HM-HOTTA_nashuangdao_all-01.Content: What are watchers doing here!? Get away from me! Help!

HM-HOTTA_nashuangdao_all-04.Content: Transmitting weapon data. Prepare for battle.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_glow_ALL-1.Content: When we were little, Zeke used to take me out here to gaze at the stars.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_glow_ALL-2.Content: I like it here. It's so quiet and peaceful. It's like all of the bad things in the world never happened.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_glow_ALL-3.Content: I wish things could be like back then... Forever.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_glow_ALL-4.Content: I... I didn't want to make Zeke sad.

HM-HOTTA_Set01_glow_ALL-6.Content: What... What am I gonna do...

HM-HOTTA_ALL-1.Content: Unauthorized visitor detected. Halt or you will be stopped by force.

HM-HOTTA_ALL-2.Content: I come from Astra... A-And I'm here with Franz!

HM-HOTTA_ALL-3.Content: Hm... Astra Shelter, area code HT501?

HM-HOTTA_ALL-4.Content: Franz has notified us about your visit.

HM-HOTTA_huanhua_dajian_ALL-1.Content: Welcome to the third generation Simulacrum weapon system.

HM-HOTTA_huanhua_dajian_ALL-3.Content: contains the combat memories and weapon parameters of many elite soldiers.

HM-HOTTA_huanhua_dajian_ALL-4.Content: They have been packaged into independent data modules.

HM-HOTTA_huanhua_dajian_ALL-5.Content: Users may call on data from specific modules.

HM-HOTTA_huanhua_dajian_ALL-6.Content: The system will simulate the host's form and combat memories,

HM-HOTTA_huanhua_dajian_ALL-7.Content: and help the users to adapt to the chaotic combat environment.

HM-HOTTA_huanhua_dajian_ALL-8.Content: Simulacrum weapons will be powerful allies throughout your adventures

HM-HOTTA_huanhua_dajian_ALL-9.Content: and help you conquer the vast world of Aida.

HM-HOTTA_huanhua_dajian_ALL-10.Content: I hope you have a pleasant time using me.

HM-Cam-2.Content: In her current condition... I need to find her now.

HM-HOTTA_city_posun_ALL-02.Content: You don't know where they're hiding. Tread carefully.

HM-HOTTA_city_posun_ALL-03.Content: You missed the best part, but at least you made it to the curtain call.

HM-HOTTA_city_posun_ALL-04.Content: Mad man! Look at what you've done!

HM-HOTTA_city_posun_ALL-05.Content: Mad man, huh? But you need one to make choices for you.

HM-HOTTA_city_posun_ALL-06.Content: You're going to destroy this world!

HM-HOTTA_city_posun_ALL-10.Content: Nemesis, you were supposed to be my proudest work, but you... betrayed me.

HT_MLR03_cam_ALL-02.Content: My, my... You haven't changed a bit.

HT_MLR03_cam_ALL-03.Content: We haven't seen each other in so long. Can't you at least smile a little?

HT_MLR03_cam_ALL-04.Content: How did we end up in the same group, anyway?

HT_MLR03_cam_ALL-05.Content: Could it be... you requested it?

HT_MLR03_cam_ALL-06.Content: You're not worried about me, are you? Ha-ha-ha...

HT_MLR03_cam_ALL-07.Content: It's snowing. Oh... and I'm your big sister.

HT_MLR03_cam_ALL-10.Content: Why won't you explain! Hey, wait up...

MRC_CJ_ALL-02.Content: No sign of Victor. We have expanded the search area.

HOTTA_7_2_duorenPK_ALL-08.Content: Warning. Energy low. Transmittable number is "1."

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_All-02.Content: Warning! The energy detector is reacting strongly!

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_All-03.Content: Large traces of enemy activity have appeared at the data signal source.

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_All-04.Content: Executor, this is an urgent situation. Please annihilate the enemies.

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_All-06.Content: Establishing a link to Meryl's Consciousness IX...

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_Siblings_All-2.Content: We haven't seen each other in a long time. Can't you at least smile?

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_Siblings_All-3.Content: How did we end up in the same group, anyway?

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_Siblings_All-4.Content: Was that because of you, Meryl?

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_Siblings_All-6.Content: Are you actually... worried about me? Ha!

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_Siblings_All-7.Content: It's snowing. Oh... and I'm older.

HOTTA_SSRMeryl_Siblings_All-10.Content: I'm pretty sure I'm the older one!

HOTTA_ZZ01_ALL-2.Content: Zeke, are you alright? How is she?

HOTTA_ZZ01_ALL-4.Content: The spacetime energy is out of control. It's going to collapse soon!

HOTTA_ZZ01_ALL-7.Content: We need to get out of here!

HOTTA_ZZ01_ALL-8.Content: No, no one's getting out that way. Someone has to end everything.

HOTTA_ZZ01_ALL-10.Content: Take care of her for me...

HOTTA_ZZ01_ALL-11.Content: Zeke! Don't... Don't leave me behind!

HOTTA_Set06_AgShow_ALL-3.Content: The stage I prepared especially for you!

ht_sc_ALL-01.Content: Hey, that looks like the design for a weapon. It should fetch good money.

ht_sc_ALL-03.Content: This is what you're looking for?

ht_sc_ALL-04.Content: How much could this old junk possibly be worth?

ht_sc_ALL-05.Content: It's actually very rare and practically priceless to me.

ht_sc_ALL-06.Content: Machines nowadays strive for sophistication, lightweight, effeciency...

ht_sc_ALL-07.Content: But this intricate, inspiring piece of art is exactly what I'm after.

ht_sc_ALL-08.Content: This is how I got interested in mechs in the first place.

ht_sc_ALL-09.Content: I figured out what my new creation is missing. Let's go.

HM-HOTTA_INCARNATION1-01.Content: You Hunters are blowing Lighthouse resources on bringing back junk like this, Marc!

HM-HOTTA_INCARNATION1-02.Content: Not sure if this feature will be useful for fighting gorgers.

HM-HOTTA_INCARNATION1-04.Content: Judging by the terrain, this is not a land Lighthouse has ever charted.

HM-HOTTA_INCARNATION1-09.Content: How did you survive? Do you know that woman on the gorger's shoulder?

HM-HOTTA_INCARNATION1-14.Content: Was it because of this thing?

HM-HOTTA_INCARNATION2-01.Content: All sentient beings share the same pure and perfect spark essence of enlightenment.

HM-HOTTA_INCARNATION3-02.Content: Thank you for all your help. I've got nothing to repay you with, except this badge.

HM-HOTTA_INCARNATION3-03.Content: Thank you, Marc. I'd like to visit your planet one day if I get the chance.

HM-HOTTA_INCARNATION3-09.Content: Hopefully I'll see you soon, too, Ms. Bai Yuekui.

HT_NMXS_01_ALL-01.Content: When we were little, Zeke used to take me out here to gaze at the stars.

HT_NMXS_01_ALL-02.Content: Really, there's no need to go?

HT_NMXS_01_ALL-03.Content: My memory, in some parts, is still fuzzy.

HT_NMXS_01_ALL-04.Content: But there are many things that can still be vaguely understood...

HT_NMXS_01_ALL-05.Content: Thank you for everything you've done.

HT_NMXS_01_ALL-06.Content: When I'm with you, some... courage, will emerge in my heart.

HT_NMXS_01_ALL-07.Content: I hope you can also take care of me in the future journey.

HM-cam1_3.Content: Cowell, does no one here in Vera need suppressors?

HM-cam1_4.Content: The Tower of Fantasy here was severely damaged in the Cataclysm. Unable to provide steady Omnium, we had to give it up.

HM-cam1_5.Content: Later on, one of our Archons came up with some tech that dramatically increases the body's resistance to Omnium radiation.

HM-cam1_6.Content: Over the years, the levels of Omnium radiation have shown a marked decline in the Vera region. People no longer need to rely on various support devices to survive.

HM-cam1_7.Content: That is the <blue>Vera Tower of Fantasy</>. All of Mirroria is built around it.

HM-cam1_9.Content: Oh, yes. She is quite the idol in many young Veran's eyes. She single-handedly defeated a powerful Abyssant not that long ago.

HM-cam1_10.Content: Ahead is the District 7 Headquarters. Please, this way to Archon Larsen.

HM-HOTTA_weila_all_003.Content: How are you feeling? Any dizziness or other discomfort?

HM-HOTTA_weila_all_006.Content: Oh, that's good... I was worried that such a long transmission would have some unpleasant effects.

HM-HOTTA_weila_all_008.Content: This is the Silvercoast Research Station, under District 7. They've managed to re-establish contact with Aesperia with this equipment.

HM-HOTTA_weila_all_010.Content: Well... This research facility is actually in the north of the Yellowrock Desert. But Mirroria's not too far!

HM-HT_lkscx_ALL_001.Content: Director Eva! We have a situation!

HM-HT_lkscx_ALL_002.Content: The spatial fluctuations are greatly intensifying... It's a temporal anomaly caused by a powerful Abyssant!

HM-HT_lkscx_ALL_003.Content: This shouldn't be possible... Buru, report to HQ immediately and request support.

HM-HT_lkscx_ALL_004.Content: I'm trying! The fluctuations are generating too much interference, we can't get a clear connection to Headquarters.

HM-HT_lkscx_ALL_005.Content: Keep trying! Tell security to close the blast doors, power up the force field, and activate the security droid.

HM-HT_lkscx_ALL_008.Content: Everyone, the cause of this spacetime fluctuation is a very rare, powerful Abyssant. We must get ready for a Grayspace Entities assault!

HM-HT_lkscx_ALL_009.Content: But at present, we are unable to contact HQ or request external assistance. If they launch an all-out assault, it would be catastrophic for us.

HM-HT_lkscx_ALL_012.Content: System Warning: Red alert. Red alert. All non-combatants, please go to the nearest safe zone and remain there until further notice.

HM-HT_lkscx_ALL_014.Content: It's the Abyssant symbiosis! We have to hurry!

HM-HOTTA_SM_zhaoyu_ALL_006.Content: Buru detected signs of Abyssant activity. Be on your guard!

HM-HOTTA_SM_zhaoyu_ALL_007.Content: The Grayspace Entities have been pushed back! Are you all okay?

HM-HOTTA_SM_zhaoyu_ALL_008.Content: That thing's still on our tail. We can't shake it!

HM-HOTTA_SM_zhaoyu_ALL_009.Content: We gotta split up, Shirli! Let's regroup at Mirroria!

HM-LD_sequence_all_001.Content: Your accommodation is being processed, please wait a moment.

HM-LD_sequence_all_003.Content: You're welcome. I'll be in Mirroria for a while, and hope I can help you get accustomed to things here.

HM-LD_sequence_all_006.Content: Would you say Ruby's important to you, Lin?

HM-LD_sequence_all_007.Content: Ruby... was entrusted to me by an old friend before she left. I swore that I'd look after her.

HM-LD_sequence_all_008.Content: We're the same there... We each have someone we don't want to let down.

HM-HOTTA_Beategg_ALL_006.Content: I told you to be careful...

HM-HOTTA_Beategg_ALL_008.Content: Split up and go after it!

HM-miaupgrade_ALL_005.Content: I've fully upgraded Mi-a. Every aspect of her performance has been improved.

HM-miaupgrade_ALL_006.Content: Seems like her language module hasn't been fixed?

HM-miaupgrade_ALL_007.Content: Don't you think that's cute? Oh, that's right, I also gave her the ability to switch up her costume!

HM-miaupgrade_ALL_008.Content: Not bad, right? Isn't it cute?

HM-LD_sequence_all_009.Content: Especially since... taking on the Grayspace Entities won't be easy.

HM-HOTTA_09_all-04.Content: Meryl, we've run into a little trouble here.

HM-HOTTA_09_all-06.Content: We... We found some kind of weird egg that might've been left by the Grayspace Entities. I worry there might be a group of Grayspace Entities hidden nearby. Could I trouble you to back us up?

HM-HOTTA_09_all-07.Content: Zero's in the middle of something, and I can't leave the research station just yet either.

HM-HOTTA_09_all-08.Content: Oh... Um... Well, what about the Executor and Shirli? Could you come? Please...

HM-HOTTA_09_all-10.Content: Thank you! I'll send you the coordinates. See you soon.

HM-HOTTA_VeraBoss_ALL-02.Content: Hold on. We have no idea what it's capable of, don't lower your guard and watch out for any sneak attacks.

HM-HOTTA_VeraBoss_ALL-03.Content: I didn't feel my strike land just now, but when its... "hand"... touched me, the Abyssant was injured.

HM-HOTTA_VeraBoss_ALL-04.Content: How strange... Probably something to do with its Field ability.

HM-HOTTA_VeraBoss_ALL-06.Content: Stay calm, and listen to me!

HM-HOTTA_VeraBoss_ALL-07.Content: I didn't get any hand feel with my last attack, just like the one before. Having said that, the touch of that "hand" feels completely different.

HM-HOTTA_VeraBoss_ALL-08.Content: This time that thing "grabbed" me. The only difference between the two attacks is obvious.

HM-HOTTA_VeraBoss_ALL-09.Content: The first "hand" touched my front, while the second hit my back.

HM-HOTTA_VeraBoss_ALL-10.Content: This is probably the true power of the Field.

HM-HOTTA_VeraBoss_ALL-11.Content: I'll leave the rest in your hands
